verbs.description: [ARG0: romania] [V: seeks] [ARGM-DIS: eu] [ARG1: funds to deal with african swine fever romania prime minister] has requested financial help from the european union to deal with the financial effects of a serious outbreak of african swine fever premier viorica dancila made the request thursday to the eu agriculture commissioner phil hogan explaining that romania needs the money to reduce the unfortunate impact the disease has had on romanian farmers hogan said the eu would evaluate the government request however he said the situation was logistically difficult given the high number of pigs that were kept by farmers in their backyards implying it would be easier for officials to disburse funds to large - scale pig farms bucharest commissioner fever veterinary health and food safety authority prime minister romania communist romania viorica dancila eu phil hogan european union

romania seeks eu funds to [V: deal] [ARG1: with african swine fever romania prime minister] has requested financial help from the european union to deal with the financial effects of a serious outbreak of african swine fever premier viorica dancila made the request thursday to the eu agriculture commissioner phil hogan explaining that romania needs the money to reduce the unfortunate impact the disease has had on romanian farmers hogan said the eu would evaluate the government request however he said the situation was logistically difficult given the high number of pigs that were kept by farmers in their backyards implying it would be easier for officials to disburse funds to large - scale pig farms bucharest commissioner fever veterinary health and food safety authority prime minister romania communist romania viorica dancila eu phil hogan european union
